title: nf-core/eduomics pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

id.errorMessage: Simulation name name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

type.errorMessage: Simulation type can only be either dna or rna

chromosome.errorMessage: The chromosome must be indicated in the form chr + number or letter

coverage.errorMessage: A coverage should be indicated or defaults to 30 for RNAseq and 50 for DNA

reps.errorMessage: Indicates the number of replicas per group (in DNA case control defaults to 1)

groups.errorMessage: indicates the number of groups (defaults to 2)

capture.errorMessage: Must be a bed file with extension '.bed'
